p: The differences among the mean antimicrobial activities (SA, EF, SP, PA, YE, SE, CA, CK, and CT) obtained from the seven registered cultivars (Bacalmas, Carmagnola, CS, Dioica, Helena, Sequieni, and Simba) and seven wild accessions (Buro, Daleka zemlia, Paluka, Perez, Saykaj, Susara, and Titelski breg) were also compared using one-way ANOVA with three replications.
